name: Wayward Warmth
description:
This is a submission for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022, a two week game jam with the "Cozy Autumn" theme. This game is built in Unreal Engine 4.23.1

This is a visual/light-novel style game where you play as a young boy who is visiting their grandfather for the fall. Wander the landscape and enjoy some beautiful scenery, cute characters, and bittersweet sentiments.

The music was sourced through royalty-free libraries. The rest of the assets were developed by us.
